Hydras/Shuttle/Perceptor:

The shuttle landed and the door oppened, outside=
 was Perceptor 
waitting to the new comer and his captors

Hydras stood up =
and said "Myrmidon and Trelos, follow Perceptor, he 
will show you where ou=
r party will be and will help him to prepare 
our guest; Jhiaxus, I'll guid=
e your pals to CR, also we have a lil 
thing to discuss before our private =
party..."and looking to Rodimus 
said devilish"We meet us in a while, old p=
al, we will have some 
funwith you before your ultimate fate"
